verbs.description: atlantic beach entrepreneur lights [V: could] save lives on halloween night they 're called third kind lights and it a business started after the founder his friend was killed by a hit - and - run driver who did n't see him while he was walking home one night in 2006 atlantic beach megan gaston halloween u s safe kids worldwide organization amazoncom amazon matt gray united states national security council chad sandiford national security council
